name: Min(e)d Your Ears
description:
See a creature, equip your earmuffs; no more creature, one more mine.

Facing an onslaught of noisy, malevolent creatures, you must destroy them all so as to remain alive... though unfortunately for you, landmines are your only weapon. Equip your earmuffs, place a mine in the safety of silence, unequip your earmuffs and enjoy the explosive sight!

CONTROLS

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Left Click - Place mine
  • Right Click - Equip/unequip earmuffs
  • O - Pause/unpause game
  • P - Toggle post-processing

TIPS

  • You can only place a mine when your earmuffs are equipped
  • Enemies will retreat for a few seconds after attacking you
  • Mines take a short amount of time to arm
  • Mines damage both you and the enemies, but only the enemies trigger them

Min(e)d Your Ears was made in 3 hours for the TriJam game jam #59.
Theme: "If you can't hear it, it doesn't exist."
Any feedback is appreciated in the comments.
Thanks for playing!
